article.title: Raytheon to Support F/A-18 Radar Warning System
article.author: George I. Seffers
article.text: Raytheon Co., Goleta, Calif., is being awarded a $89,335,116 four year performance-based logistics contract for nine Weapons Replaceable Assemblies used to support the AN/ALR-67(v) 3 for the F/A-18 A/B/C/D/E/F. Naval Supply Systems Command Weapon Systems Support, Philadelphia, Pa., is the contracting activity.
